v8:item.v8:content: Transport kind selection from available kinds group
Transport kind selection from available kinds group

Accounting is maintained in both applications, so you should map the data. This will help to avoid creation of catalog item duplicates that were independently introduced in both applications. For example, catalog items with identical descriptions. During mapping you can specify data items that are identical in both applications.
All data is mapped. Make sure that automatic data mapping is executed correctly.
Flag shows whether there are unmapped data items
If the automatic data synchronization is required, the schedule can be set up of that.
Click Done to finish operation with the wizard.
